items.name: static let alternateQuotationBeginDelimiterKey: CFLocaleKey!
items.desc: Specifies the alternating begin quotation symbol associated with the locale. In some locales, when quotations are nested, the quotation characters alternate. Thus, NSLocaleQuotationBeginDelimiterKey, then NSLocaleAlternateQuotationBeginDelimiterKey, and so on.

items.name: static let alternateQuotationEndDelimiterKey: CFLocaleKey!
items.desc: Specifies the alternating end quotation symbol associated with the locale. In some locales, when quotations are nested, the quotation characters alternate. Thus, NSLocaleQuotationEndDelimiterKey, then NSLocaleAlternateQuotationEndDelimiterKey, and so on.

items.name: static let collatorIdentifier: CFLocaleKey!
items.desc: Specifies the collation identifier for the locale.

items.name: static let groupingSeparator: CFLocaleKey!
items.desc: Specifies the separator string between groups of digits.

items.name: static let quotationBeginDelimiterKey: CFLocaleKey!
items.desc: Specifies the begin quotation symbol associated with the locale.

items.name: static let quotationEndDelimiterKey: CFLocaleKey!
items.desc: Specifies the end quotation symbol associated with the locale.

items.name: static let usesMetricSystem: CFLocaleKey!
items.desc: Specifies the whether the locale uses the metric system.
